item.description:
RSVP to obtain participation info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar

---------------------------------------------------------

Are excited about investing?

Good for you for getting ready to make your first or next investment!

BUT ARE YOU REALLY READY?

This webinar contains 12 critical questions you should be asking yourself before you start investing.

Make sure you are not like many investors who do very little preparation on their end before investing.

In this webinar, we will explain the most important question you should be asking yourself to make sure you are ready to invest and in the right investment program.

These simple but not-trivial question will help you determine the right investment path for you.


--------------------------------------------------------

RSVP to obtain participation info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar
item.name: Are You Ready? 12 Important Questions You Should Be Asking Yourself - Webinar
